backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, observations, kaizens, photos, and activity tracking with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a UI change for repositioning the CSV export button on the manager inactivity dashboard.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference in build or review workflows.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines router, authentication guards, layout, and routes for all major app pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth wrapper that blocks unauthenticated users and shows a loading state during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access guard that restricts admin‑only pages and shows an access‑denied alert when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyState: Reusable empty‑state component with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenAss: Manager panel for assigning a kaizen to a department and specifying required tools.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenDec: Manager panel for approving or rejecting a kaizen with required comments.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenPho: Displays implementation photos for a kaizen with loading, empty, and gallery states.
Image uploader for Kaizen entries with validation and upload progress using ExternalBlob and mutateAsync.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenSta: Renders a status badge for a Kaizen based on predefined label and variant mappings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, user menu, admin links, and mobile drawer controlled by identity and role checks.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple container layout wrapper providing consistent page padding and max width.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile setup dialog allowing a user to submit their name and default role via a profile creation mutation.
Sends periodic activity pings to the backend when identity is active and the page is visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Queries the caller's user profile and admin status using the current actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend operations for observations, kaizens, photos, activities, and user profile updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base colors and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Allows admins to look up users by principal and assign roles, showing profile details when available.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays key metrics, recent kaizens, and quick action buttons using fetched observations and kaizen data.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenDetailPa: Shows full details for a specific kaizen with admin actions, assignment options, and photo management.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenListPage: Lists kaizen entries with search and status filters, adjusting visibility based on user role.
Form page for submitting a new Kaizen, handling validation, mutation, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides role-based login via Internet Identity and redirects users based on stored login intent.
frontend/src/pages/manager/AnalyticsPage: Dashboard that aggregates observations and kaizens to display metrics, charts, and summary statistics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/GapsPage.tsx: Displays low-activity areas and departments using gap-analysis utilities to highlight underreported segments.
frontend/src/pages/manager/InactivityDas: Shows operators inactive for a configurable number of days and provides CSV export of inactivity data.
frontend/src/pages/manager/OperatorActiv: Lists all operator activity with sorting, inactivity calculations, and thresholds for identifying inactive users.
frontend/src/pages/observations/Observat: Detail view displaying full information for a specific observation, including metadata and navigation controls.
A form page for creating and submitting new safety or quality observations with validation and navigation.
Displays a filterable and searchable list of observations, restricting visibility for non-admin users.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Provides analytics utilities for counting submissions, identifying top areas, and calculating kaizen metrics.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates and triggers download of CSV files from data arrays.
frontend/src/utils/loginSelection.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears login intent in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project's versioned state, known issues, and a list of implemented features for role‑based access, operator submissions, and manager workflows. Serves as a central record of requirements, statuses, and architectural context.
